    • Uses of GoalRule in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal

      Subclasses of GoalRule in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DoAllTasksRule
      A DoAllTasksRule defines a task rule by which all mentioned tasks have to be fulfilled.
      class  DoAnyTaskRule
      A DoAnyTaskRule defines a task rule by which only one of all mentioned tasks have to be fulfilled.
      class  GetPointsRule
      A PointsRule is a sub-class of the GoalRule.
      class  TaskRule
      A TaskRule defines the combination of tasks until a goal is fulfilled.
      Methods in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal that return GoalRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GoalRule Goal.getRule()
      Gets the rule that defines which tasks have to be completed how to fulfil the goal.
      Methods in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal with parameters of type GoalRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Goal.setRule(GoalRule rule)
      Sets the rule of this goal which defines the needed tasks for fulfilling the goal.
